actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the Committee on House Administration to acquire a suitable residence to be maintained as a home for pages employed by the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Authorizes the House of Representatives Committee on House Administration to rent or otherwise acquire a suitable residence to be maintained as a home for the pages employed by the House, and to appoint an individual to act as supervisor of the home. Requires all pages employed by the House to reside in the home unless authorized by the committee to live elsewhere. Permits pages employed by the Senate, with approval of the committee, to reside in such home.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Committee on House Administration to acquire a suitable residence to be maintained as a home for pages employed by the House of Representatives.
